Package com.cmput301.recipebot.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRecipeActivity
    An abstract Activity that displays a Recipe to the user.
    BaseActivity
    This is our base activity.
    EditRecipeActivity
    An Activity that allows user to add a recipe.
    GetUserActivity  
    HorizontalScrollableScrollView
    A custom ScrollView taht doesn't interfere with horizontal swiping.
    MainActivity
    Main Activity, that shows two fragments PantryFragment and SavedRecipesGridFragment.
    MainActivity.TabsAdapter
    This is a helper class that implements the management of tabs and all details of connecting a ViewPager with associated TabHost.
    MainActivity.TabsAdapter.TabInfo  
    SearchRecipeActivity
    Contains a NetworkRecipeGridFragment to display recipes from the network.
    ViewRecipeActivity
    An activity that allows the user to view a recipe.
